description.value:
Your shots become nimble and deadly. While you're in this stance, your ranged Strikes don't trigger Attacks of Opportunity or other reactions that are triggered by a ranged attack.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Attack of Opportunity], you can use it with a loaded ranged weapon you're wielding. The triggering creature must be within 5 feet of you for you to do so.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Stance: Mobile Shot Stance]
